Es sieht verdächtig aus. Öffne die Tür nicht.
Sembra sospetto. Non aprire la porta.
Parece sospechoso. No abras la puerta.
무슨 일이 벌어질 지 모르니까 그만둔다
It looks suspicious. Don't open the door.
好像會出事所以還是算了

勇気ある洞窟探険家よ、\nよくぞ無事にここまで辿り着いた
Courageous cave explorer, \nyou have safely made it here.
Explorateur de grottes courageux, \nvous êtes bien arrivé ici.
Mutiger Höhlenforscher, \nSie haben es sicher hierher geschafft.
Esploratore di grotte coraggioso, \nsei arrivato qui sano e salvo.
Explorador de cuevas valiente, \nhas llegado aquí sano y salvo.
용기 있는 동굴 탐험가여,\n무사히 여기까지 도착했구나.
勇敢的洞窟探險家啊！\n恭喜您平安到達這裡！
勇敢的洞窟探險家啊！\n多虧你能平安到達這裡！
Courageous cave explorer, \nyou have safely made it here.
記念に「石板のかけら（地）」を進呈しよう
As a token of your courage, take this "Stone Slab (Earth)".
En guise de symbole de votre courage, prenez ce "Fragment de Pierre (Terre)".
Als Zeichen Ihres Mutes, nehmen Sie diesen "Steinsplitter (Erde)".
Come simbolo del tuo coraggio, prendi questo "Frammento di Pietra (Terra)".
Como símbolo de tu valentía, toma este "Fragmento de Piedra (Tierra)".
As a token of your courage, take this "Stone Slab (Earth)".
送給你「石板的碎片（地）」當做記念吧！
送給你「石板的碎片（地）」當做記念吧！
As a token of your courage, take this "Stone Slab (Earth)".
扉を開いて先へ進ませたいところだが、\n現在はここまでとなっている
I would like to let you go further, \nbut it seems that we can only go this far.
Je voudrais vous laisser aller plus loin, \nmais il semble que nous ne pouvons aller que jusqu'ici.
Ich würde Sie gerne weiter lassen, \naber es scheint, dass wir nur so weit kommen können.
Vorrei lasciarti andare oltre, \nma sembra che possiamo solo arrivare fin qui.
Me gustaría dejarte avanzar más, \npero parece que solo podemos llegar hasta aquí.
문을 열고 앞으로 나아가고 싶지만, \n지금은 여기까지다.
I would like to let you go further, \nbut it seems that the door has been locked.
雖然我想打開門讓你過去，\n不過現在只能前進到這裡為止。
雖然我想打開門讓你過去，\n不過現在只能前進到這裡為止。
I would like to let you go further, \nbut it seems that we can only go this far.

It seems the door is locked.
Il semble que la porte soit verrouillée.
Es scheint, dass die Tür abgeschlossen ist.
Sembra che la porta sia chiusa a chiave.
Parece que la puerta está cerrada con llave.
문은 열쇠로 잠글 수 있는 것 같다.
That's the farthest you can get for now.
It seems the door is locked.

Quand la porte sera ouverte, revenez.

Cuando la puerta esté abierta, vuelve de nuevo.
When the door is open, come again.

When the door is open, come again.
